meta.name: description
meta.content: Castlight helps you get more out of your health plan and benefits so you can experience healthcare in a whole new way. Register or log in today.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Castlight, Mycastlight, Mycastlighthealth, Castlight Health, Castlight login, Health benefits platform, Healthcare costs, Healthcare cost transparency, Healthcare dashboard, Find a doctor, Search for doctor, Healthcare claims, Manage healthcare, My healthcare, Healthcare, Primary care for adults, Adult Primary Care, Obstetrics and gynecologic care, Dermatologist visit, MRI, Colonoscopy, Psychological and psychiatric care, Orthopedic surgeon visit, Dermatologist, Primary Care for Children, Lab test, Healthcare assistant, Health benefits
Castlight helps you get more out of your health plan and benefits so you can experience healthcare in a whole new way. Register or log in today.

div.span: Your health and benefits in one place
div.p: With Castlight, you can easily see a breakdown of your coverage and costs, discover benefits that make life easier, and get rewarded for the healthy things you do.
Take your digital insurance card wherever you go and access health info anytime.
Securely view your plan details and know the cost before you go.
Find benefits at your fingertips and earn rewards for making healthy choices.

p.i: Based on your health plan and employee benefits, you may see different features in Castlight.

div.p: "Recently, when my doctor sent me down the hall for blood work, I used the Castlight app right then and there to look up the price and find a lower cost lab not far away."
Know where to go when you need care, and access your doctors, insurance cards, and emergency numbers anytime, anywhere.
Enter your mobile number and receive a link to download the Castlight app for free. Standard messaging rates apply. US phone numbers only.

fieldset.legend: Text to download mobile app form:
fieldset.label: Phone Number

div.p: Get 1-on-1 support from a Castlight Guide. Click to chat or call 1-888-722-0483, weekdays 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. ET.

div.h2: Join the millions of people using Castlight

img.style: visibility: hidden; position: absolute; left: -999px; top: -999px;
